In honor of our Senior Class, Riverdale Local Schools, along with many other schools across Ohio, jwe are going to light up the stadiums. This recognition of our Senior Class will take place on Monday, April 20th at 8:20 PM (20:20).
Though the campus will remain closed, schools around the BVC are joining together in solidarity to show support to the seniors.
The community is invited to join us by turning on their porch lights.
